main.name: Rahul G N
main.description: Currently pursuing MSc in Digitalization & Automation
main.employer: Open to Internship / Working Student Roles
main.jobDescription: Driven by passion for robotics, digitalization, and industrial automation.
main.bio: I am an Automation & Digitalization master's student in Germany, with a hands-on approach to learning and a passion for robotics. I’m constantly building, experimenting, and eager to contribute to real-world industrial applications. My strength lies in understanding both hardware and software aspects of automation, including PLC programming, sensor integration, and digital twin technologies.
main.contactmessage: Want to collaborate, hire, or discuss a project? Let's connect!

resume.skillmessage: I'm constantly learning new technologies, but these are where I'm currently strongest:

education.school: University of Europe for Applied Sciences
education.description: Focused on robotics, automation, IoT, control systems, PLC programming, and digital transformation in industrial environments. Gaining expertise in technologies such as KUKA Sim, MATLAB, and industrial data analytics.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science Engineering
education.description: Developed a strong foundation in computer systems, programming, and applied machine learning. Completed multiple projects including Twitter bot detection, dam management systems, and web-based automation tools.

Completed a hands-on diploma program focused on computer fundamentals, programming, and system design.Completed multiple projects Student feedback & Attandance management systems, and web-based tools like HTML, CSS, MYSQL server.

work.title: Werkstudent Rider
work.description: Delivered groceries efficiently via e-bike across Hamburg, consistently met performance targets, and collaborated with a diverse international team in a high-paced tech-enabled environment.

work.title: Insurance Coordinator Executive
work.description: Managed vehicle insurance sales and customer documentation, supported internal reporting via Zoom, and contributed to streamlined operations within the dealership.

testimonials.text: Rahul is very passionate and hands-on with his approach to automation and digital systems. He brings energy, curiosity, and commitment to every project.
